mapper.select:
SELECT M.*, MI.SRC IMG, NVL(ML.LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MENU_IMAGE WHERE DEFAULT_IMG = 1) MI ON M.ID = MI.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MENU_ID, COUNT(MENU_ID) LIKE_COUNT FROM MENU_LIKE GROUP BY MENU_ID) ML ON M.ID = ML.MENU_ID
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
AND KOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR ENG_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU ( KOR_NAME, ENG_NAME, PRICE, REG_MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_ID, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{korName}, #{engName}, #{price}, #{regMemberId}, #{categoryId}, #{description} )
